assessments.status_rationale: No reporting of the November 2025 CPI YoY print in today’s coverage; BLS release is expected imminently (around Dec 11).
No mention of the November 2025 Core CPI YoY figure; official release expected this week.
FOMC decision/SEP due Dec 11; articles note market anticipation but provide no SEP median projection.
No definitive Cboe VIX close at or below 12.0 reported; requires market close data not present here.
No Russell 2000 close level cited; need verified market data showing ≥ 2,350.
No EIA storage report figures discussed; no evidence of a ≥120 Bcf withdrawal.
NFIB November 2025 data not referenced; release expected around Dec 10.
No University of Michigan preliminary Current Conditions print reported; release typically around Dec 13.
No Philadelphia Fed Prices Paid index data for December cited; report due later in the month.
No NAHB/Wells Fargo HMI print for December reported; release expected mid-December.
No OFAC/Treasury press release on Venezuela designations noted in today’s news.
No Chrome Stable Channel security notes referenced; no evidence of a V8 high-severity UAF acknowledgment.
No citation of the Android December 2025 Security Bulletin contents; need official bulletin to verify kernel EoP CVE ≥7.8.
